The moves are part of Google's plans to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. The changes will be effective on April 4. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, said Eric Schmidt . Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin . However, he will focus externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought

Eric Schmidt said he will step down as chief executive officer in favor of Google co-founder Larry Page and become executive chairman. Eric Schmidt is`` committed to Google,'' he said at the Digital-Life-Design conference in Munich on Tuesday. How long are you committed to doing what you're doing? As long as it's exciting, he said in response to a question about his plans. Advertisement Eric Schmidt , 55, may be considering a career as a television host, the New York Post reported. ... It just[ felt] negative.'' The` Just Go With It' star was referring to past seasons that included the outspoken Simon Cowell at the judges' table. Oprah Winfrey defended him, saying, I'm a Simon Cowell fan and what I thought is that Simon Cowell had a way of speaking the truth that was saying what you wanted to say but you wouldn't actually say it. She added,`` I will say that it's a kinder, gentler[ show now.]''
